Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the content of the video by stating that it shows a "DNC Group" teaching "ILLEGAL VOTING in Arizona" when in reality it shows two conservative activists trying to get a Democratic organizer to tell them how to vote illegally.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by not accurately representing the content and context of the video.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it is based on a selectively edited video and misconstrued comments.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the video accurately represents the actions and intentions of the Democratic organizer.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not consider alternative explanations for the actions and statements made in the video.
